item.title: This Is the Best Week of the Year to Buy a House
item.description: More inventory, lower mortgage rates and less competition make October 12 to 18 the best time to by a house.

item.description: CDC guidance and insurance policies still allow most Americans to receive a free COVID-19 booster shot.

item.title: This Underused Retirement Strategy Could Boost Your Fixed-Income Payout by 23%
item.description: Using annuities alongside the 4% rule can increase retirement income by as much as 23%.

item.title: Current Mortgage Rates: October 10, 2025
item.description: Freddie Mac's rate for a 30-year fixed-rate mortgage decreased by 0.04 percentage points to average 6.3% for the week ending October 9.

item.title: Shutdown Fears Have Americans Pausing Pricey Purchases
item.description: Some Americans are adjusting plans for big-ticket purchases amid economic uncertainty caused by the shutdown.
